description:
Refill your Radius repeller with 40 hours of mosquito protection.

  • 10 square meter field of protection in 10–30 minutes
  • Fully sealed and spill proof. Travel friendly design
  • Active ingredient: Metofluthrin
  • Only for use with Thermacell Radius Zone Mosquito Repeller
  • Includes 6 repellent mats (24 of protection)
name: Thermacell Radius Zone Mosquito Repellent Refill 40 Hours
